snippet: Daniel Herron had not played a down since the Sugar Bowl because of N.C.A.A. suspensions but ran for 114 yards and a touchdown in his return Saturday as Ohio State defeated No. 16 Illinois.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Herron had not played a down since the Sugar Bowl because of N.C.A.A. suspensions but ran for 114 yards and a touchdown in his return Saturday as Ohio State defeated No. 16 Illinois.

headline.main: Herron Returns to Lead Buckeyes to Victory
headline.print_headline: Herron Returns to Lead Buckeyes to Victory
